title: Online Child Welfare Practice Education Based on Constructivist Principles

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social welfare concepts and knowledge of child developmental stages
context.additional_context: Constructivist approach emphasizing project-based assessment and interactive learning in smartphone-centric limited tech environments

learning_goals: Can analyze and propose child welfare practice cases from a child rights perspective
Can share case solutions with peers using LMS collaboration tools
Can participate in child problem scenario simulations using mobile-optimized educational content

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
